dct_title_s: New Jersey happy motoring guide / [prepared for] Esso, Humble Oil & Refining Company.
dct_description_sm: No relief shown. Panel title. "Issued November 1964." Includes "Combined index to New Jersey and Northeast New Jersey maps", "Sight-seeing guide to New Jersey", table of "Principal public recreation areas of New Jersey", and insets of "Camden-Philadelphia and vicinity" and "Atlantic City and vicinity." Maps on verso: Northeast New Jersey [Scale 1:130,000. 1 in. = about 2 miles] -- Trenton -- Downtown Newark.
dct_publisher_sm: Convent Station, N.J. : General Drafting Co., ©1964.
